item.description:
Join us in supporting the Connecticut Food Bank's New Haven-area Walk Against Hunger at East Rock Park in New Haven. Registration starts at 1:00 PM with the walk at 2:00 PM.

You can donate online to sponsor one of our walkers at the Connecticut Food Bank walk site, or bring a check payable to the Connecticut Food Bank to any Humanist Association of Connecticut event this month.

If you'd like to join our team of walkers, go to http://www.blueskycol..., click on "Join a Team" in the "New Haven" column and select "Humanist Association of Connecticut" from the list. You are welcome to walk with us even if you have not joined our team.

There will be free parking available across the street from the park at Wilbur Cross High School. It's an easy 3 mile route, mostly flat. The walk will be held rain or shine, so please dress accordingly.
item.name: New Haven Walk Against Hunger for Connecticut Food Bank
